text: William Abb Cannon (August 2, 1937 â€“ May 18, 2018) was an American football running back and tight end. He played professionally in the American Football League (AFL) and National Football League (NFL). He was born in Philadelphia, Mississippi. Cannon started playing football at Louisiana State University. He later played for the Oakland Raiders, Houston Oilers and the Kansas City Chiefs. In February 2013, Cannon suffered a stroke and was hospitalized in Baton Rouge. Cannon died on May 18, 2018 in St. Francisville, Louisiana at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * LSU Tigers bio Category:1937 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Oakland Raiders players Category:Tennessee Titans players Category:Kansas City Chiefs players Category:Sportspeople from Mississippi Category:Sportspeople from Louisiana Category:Heisman Trophy winners
title: Billy Cannon
